scripts.build:patcher-443: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/port443_redirect.js android/patchers/port443_redirect.ts
scripts.patcher:443: bun run build:patcher-443 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port443_redirect.js
scripts.patcher:443:log: bun run build:patcher-443 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port443_redirect.js 2>&1 | tee logs/patcher_443_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
scripts.build:patcher-12020: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/port12020_redirect.js android/patchers/port12020_redirect.ts
scripts.patcher:12020: bun run build:patcher-12020 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port12020_redirect.js
scripts.patcher:12020:log: bun run build:patcher-12020 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port12020_redirect.js 2>&1 | tee logs/patcher_12020_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
scripts.build:port443: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/port_443_logger.js android/loggers/port_443_logger.ts
scripts.port443: bun run build:port443 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port_443_logger.js
scripts.port443:log: bun run build:port443 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port_443_logger.js 2>&1 | tee logs/sessions/tls_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
scripts.build:port443v2: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/port_443_logger_v2.js android/loggers/port_443_logger_v2.ts
scripts.port443v2: bun run build:port443v2 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port_443_logger_v2.js
scripts.port443v2:log: bun run build:port443v2 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port_443_logger_v2.js 2>&1 | tee logs/sessions/tls_v2_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
scripts.build:port12020: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/port_12020_logger.js android/loggers/port_12020_logger.ts
scripts.port12020: bun run build:port12020 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port_12020_logger.js
scripts.port12020:log: bun run build:port12020 && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port_12020_logger.js 2>&1 | tee logs/sessions/port12020_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
scripts.build:combined: mkdir -p android/build && bunx frida-compile -o android/build/port_443_12020_logger.js android/loggers/port_443_12020_logger.ts
scripts.combined-logger: bun run build:combined && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port_443_12020_logger.js
scripts.combined-logger:log: bun run build:combined && frida -U -f com.habby.archero -l android/build/port_443_12020_logger.js 2>&1 | tee logs/sessions/combined_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log
